values:
sorry i haven't updated in awhile. ok so i liked this guy sean for awhile now right. and recently like today kind of recently he just asked out this girl becka.....i'm like crushed only because he made it seem like he liked me soooooo much, and i waited for him to ask me out for the longest time and last night he told me he didn't want a gf right now but that he could see us happening this summer when he isn't trying to bring his grades up anymore and that won't matter so i was like okay u know i thought he still liked me. wellll. u know how he said he didn't want a gf right now??? which is a bunch of shit. guys are so full of shit. cuz now he has a girl friend. and he was nice enough to come up to me after school when i am almost to tears over HIM. he goes "hey whats up case" and i just gave him this look like "why are u talking to me" kind of look. i am so mad right now. but more depressed then mad. o well i hope they have a happy relationship together. :). no really i do....because he is a great guy even though he did do that and it really sucks....he lied to me!!! i am so sad. i am ganna go. thanks kiley for being there for me. made me feel better.



xoxoxo,
~*Casey*~

i don't care what everyone else is doing. i don't follow the in croud. i dare to be different. :-). 




~Case~

i dunno if you guys have noticed it but i have so i am going to say something, doesn't it seem like all the couples are like breaking up?? so much for love  being in the spring air. like i can name 7 couples that have broken up in the last 2 weeks. which i find sad. because looking at them i somehow think maybe someday i will find him and it will last............anyways on other news its finally friday and i am excited because it has been a long week!!! and i'm leaving to go camping tonight. so i won't be able to update about it until either late sunday night or monday morning. but yeah,  nate, simon, claire, everybodys going so its going to be great. kiley i wish u were going!!! u so should have gone!! i don't care if ur not a camping person..i'm no camper either! lol. look at me i'm bringing a rolling suitcase full of crap! that either nate or simon is going to lift into the car and carry for me right!!?! lol. cuz its really heavy and they love me right!?!?! lol.


well i won't say bye to you guys cuz of erin explaining to me why she isn't saying it. so i will just say i will miss u while i am gone! later!!!!


-Casey
http://dis-b-da-life.livejournal.com/12125.html

its surprizing how much things change in a week. things either change like sooooo much or not at all. its weird i just noticed that. well girls night is still going to kick ass this wk end girlies. butttttttt simon is just being a butt right now and he is like my best friend so i love him but he is being stupid and making a dumb mistake personally i think he will regret it later on but whatever thats not my buissness. so claire and derek broke up which was sad cause they were cute <3. but claire at least u can say it happened see i can't even say that cuz it didn't...its kind of sad. i'm like the only one who has stayed the same. lonely and single. man do i need an award for that or something. wow. lol. i think i should have one made and then i will frame it. well i am tired so i am going to sleep now i love u so much all of you. ur forever in my heart....if u comment...



~*Casey*~

CLAIRE AND DEREK ARE SUCH A CUTE COUPLE AND I AM SO HAPPY FOR THEM. I HOPE U GUYS LAST!!!! I REALLY DO!!! KILEY AND I ARE GOING TO HAVE THE BEST WEEKEND THIS WEEKEND WITH THE GIRLS. AND THEN KILEY IS GOING TO TRY TO FIND OUT IF THE GUY I LIKE LIKES ME. I REALLY HOPE SO. CUZ I REALLY LIKE HIM. AND YA I FEEL LIKE I WOULD UNDERSTAND HOW KILEY FEELS A LOT MORE IF I HAD A BOY FRIEND AND HE IS PERFECT FOR THE SPOT. BUT I AM NOT GOING TO KEEP MY HOPES UP...BECAUSE EVERYTIME I DO IT TURNS OUT SAD IN THE END..AND IF I DO END UP GOING OUT WITH THEM THEY NORMALLY END UP CHEATING, OR DOING SOMETHING GAY THAT MAKES ME WANT TO BREAK UP WITH THEM. SO FAR HE HASN'T. AND I DUNNO. I AM SO BAD WITH GUYS THOUGH. THEIR JUST NOT MY THING I GUESS...MAYBE ITS CUZ I AM BUTT ASS UGLY.




~*CASEY*~

i had a good day today. did u? lets see i woke up late at about 10. which i relize isn't really that late but during the week waking up at 6 every morning thats late for me. then kiley called me after i took a shower we went to the mall and simon and nate met us there 2 hours after we got what we wanted  because they hate waiting for us so whatever. they just complain about how hungry they are the whole time. so ya that was my day. and then nate "dropped" his ice cream down my shirt from dairy queen and ew it was so gross and cold. and hes like does it make u want to take ur shirt off and i was liek NO. and he was like o damnnnn not enough i guess. it was pretty funny but i was kind of mad cuz it looked like my boobs were foaming lol kiley!!!!! but it was a great day and i would relive it in a heart beat



sleeping at kileys call us if u need us


~*Casey*~
http://dis-b-da-life.livejournal.com/11323.html

wow erin seems like everyone has mentioned ur birthday on livejournal today so i just had too. happy birthday. yesturday kiley and i hung out alone for awhile and it was nice and we hung out and talked like we used to and it was such fun i loved it i really did. and then today we went for a walk in the rain and went to nates house and claire was over at his house with alex so we called simon and brian and they came and we all are going to the movies tonight in liek 30 mins cuz it starts at 9:10. i am excited and its going to be fun. and i relized that perhaps this whole kiley simon relationship thing is the best thing that ever happened to kiley and i need to let whatever was bugging me go. its not that big of a deal. we do still hang out so its not like shes completely ditching me. and i have other friends with for when she is with simon sometimes and just needs to be alone with him. so i am completely okay with that ki and i just wanted you to know that because i love you.




Love,
~*Casey*~

i'm sick.. :-(... i think i have food poisening because last night i went to mac. grill with alexis and we both got the same thing and now were both sick..sad..but i blame them. o well.. at least were sick together. too bad it couldn't wait until tuesday i have a math test i wouldn't mind missing lol. well i'm bored as hell and feel like shit comment to cheer me up


Love,

so i haven't updated in about a week so how is everybody? valentines day is monday! luke is my valentine!!!!  <3 <3 <3 <3!!! no were not going out just good friends who want to enjoy the holiday .. and he is really hot and he asked me to be his valentine and i have to go because i just relized its 4:45 and i have to get to erins by 5. well kiley is my ride and thats when shes going...and ummm i love u guys. post who ur valentine is or anonymously post who u wish ur valentine was....


i love you

i am sooooo i don't even know right now. too much to think about. kidn of bumbed because tomorrow simon and kiley are going to disneyland. i dunno what i thnik about that. i really love them all and everything but when kiley told me that she could bring one person with her and she chose to take simon..imagine how that feels??i am not mad or anything..but i dunno it was just kind of dissapointing. but no i didn't talk about kiley behind her back we talked this through already and she knows where i stand and how i feel about this and everything. and she is a great friend. and i know her and simon have been kind of shakey lately and she wanted it to feel all patched up again but you know what... i dunno me and kiley spend all the time together and i don't mind sharing all the time she has with simon because he is a great person and i love them both and he makes her so happy. and i am really happy plus i am going to carlys  house tomorrow. i hope u and simon have so much fun tomorrow kiley! bring me back a t-shirt or something!! hehe i love you!



*Casey*

ughhhhhh i got a saturday!!!! this sucks so bad!!!!! ok well i wrote about this awhile ago how i got raped and ever since i have been jumpy when people touch me that i am not comfortable with and this odd kid touched me today so i kneed him a good one where it counts..and he complained to everyone that i tried to make it so he couldn't have children no i was just defending my personal space which anyone who has been in my situation would do! because it is scairy and hurtful and changes ur life. so it gets around of course and i get called to the office feeling i did nothing wrong i spoke my side and my opinion loud and proud and wtf i get in trouble for it??? he shouldn't have been touching me in the first place. 2nd of all i hate this kid before this even happened and he knew that. so i dunno what the hell his problem is.


i have to go though going to kileys for a little chat and study session. 


*Casey*

nate said he isn't annoying so i have to prove he is, nate this is all the shit u do that annoys me lol but i love u and ur my best friend:


1. if ur counting something he just yells out random numbers

2. he always adjusts the tint on the tv like everytime i watch tv with him so that the people are tinted green...and he will never let me fix it hes alwyas like i like it like that??

3. when u ask him to staple something he will .. but he will staple it in the middle of the page everytime it never fails

4. he calls 1 800 numbers and asks the people out on a date because he thinks its hysterical..he does that like 2 times a day it was funny at first but not anymore..lol

5. he sets alarm clocks for random times??

6. he changes the tv channel 5 mins before the end of every show

7. when we got to resturants he has gone it and all he has ordered were the mints that they have for free at the cash register and water...why even bother making a reservation for that?

8. he gets orange traffic cones for free from his uncles work or something he him and simon because they think its funny go out and put them across random streets to see people turn around and go a different way?? they crack up to! thats not funny!?!

9. he pays for a lot of things in pennies..like just because he thought it would be funny he has 5 dollars in change coming to him and he asks if the lady can give it to him in pennies and she does and it took forever to sit there and get it counted out

10. just to be annoying he repeats half the shit u say as a question even though he heard u the first time

11. he made me and kiley only call him "Conquistador" for like 3 days straight and got mad when we forgot?

12. omg it was kind of funny but we went to the laundry mat and he put 1 sock in each washer thing and like took up 2 and people were in line waiting and he only wash 2 socks...:-/ it was really funny


nate i love u ur a cool kid...but read the list man! bff!!!

~*Casey*~

so apparently i messed up some how. and simon is mad at me??? thats what i heard and he doesn't answer his phone so i wouldn't no fur sure yet. kiley would know. but shes with him so w.e. it makes me sad. because my best friend is always with him, and if hes mad at me then who am i going to hang out with? all my friends hang out with him kind of. like nate and kiley and carly and ashley. everyone. it kind of sucks. if anyone knows anything like why or when he started being mad at me. or if this is just a rumor :-) hopefully it is..then comment and let me know. or call me.



~*Casey*~


p.s. - sorry i didn't write about anything else but right now that and finals is basically all thats on my mind. o and this wkend because nate, simon, me and kiley are going to DISNEYLAND! u are so jealous i just know u are! another reason why i have to clear this whole simon thing up by then. alright i'm out.

(those of u that don't know her she gets pissed at kiley because simon is always with her everytime she sees her.) don't worry kiley shes just jealous. because even if she did get a bf he wouldn't be as gr8 as simon. and they deff. wouldn't be as cute of a couple. :-). i love u babe!



-Casey

wow there is so much to write about but wow i really don't feel like typing. as most of u have probably read from kileys journal yes we did get into a car crash but nothing major and everybody is alive so were fine. simon comes home today and everything. but now i am scaired for getting my license i thought i was ready but after that i feel like i don't want to get behind the wheel yet. too risky with all the dumb ass drivers not to mention the drunk ones on the road. thats my bigest fear right now i have to admitt. but if u were in the car i bet you would feel the same way. lets see, other then that i hung out with claire, erin, matt, dan and yeah i think thats it. we went to claires watched a movie and slept over. it was fun. and exciting and something different for once. ooo and on other news kiley and me are friends again so i am really happy. u know how you have like the best friend that u never fight with and their always there and maybe u get kind of a little mad at them or annoyed sometimes but u just never bring it up or say anything and it passes and ur still friends. and then u have the other best friend where u fight sometimes but u always make up and sometimes the fighting just brings u closer. well the second one i think is me and kiley but i love her the same as i would the other best friend. :-). 



i could have gone into detail but i didn't feel like typing, erin remember last night 'shoot me' or was it 'sue me' lol. that was so funny i love you so much thanks for being there for me and kiley i know she is thankful to we really needed a friend to be there. and even though u and her weren't that close u came anyway. thats a true best friend. i love you. and i feel like i need to talk to you more often. oooo and i love hearing the stories from az again and again and again so don't worry about it. kt's so cool i don't mind hearing about her all the time. lol. ROCK ON! 


~Casey~

i really miss one of my friends right now. we use to best friends forever and seriously i blew up at her and i feel bad. but she has just made me so mad lately. and i feel like i need some space. i don't know if u understand what i am saying but i just needed to say that. new years wasn't as great as i thought it would be. i thought i would spend it with my best friends but i didn't. instead i spent it with my mom and her crazy boy friend. and they got drunk and passed out. then i went to sleep. wow. great fun. guys are so retarded. they make me just want to shoot myself sometimes. 




~Casey~


and kiley..i'm really sorry and its you i miss and i want to be friends and talk this out but i just need some more time. cause i think ur keeping something from me. and if were really best friends i think i deserve to know. i tell you everything. i love you ki. so it just hurts i guess..that and everything else added on. but if u tell me honestly there is nothing ur keeping from me then i guess i will have to be believe you. lol.

this is really personal and i don't want to share it with you all but.. i should be the happiest kid in the world right now. i am going on a snowboarding trip with my best friends in the whole world. and my parents are letting me, let alone giving me money and my presents to take with me. its so nice to know that they trust me. but on top of all this i feel like a spoiled brat because i'm not happy. as many of you know i once again got used. i am tired of guys. sick and tired of them. i hate them. except of course nate, simon and my daddy. :-(. other then that they suck dick. none of them can be trusted they lie and they cheat. and they take away ur fucking virginity when u say no! damn right people i got raped. :-(. so i am in a horrible mood right now. and besides kiley, nate, erin and simon everyone is blaming it on me. saying it wasn't rape because it was partly my fault. no i did not expect my first time to be like that at all. and i can't even do anything about it. if u knew the story u'd care and possibly u would vote with me and possibly it would be against me. but i don't feel like discussing it right now. i feel like going on vacation with my friends and forgetting this ever happened. but do you know what...it did happen. and all my life i am going to remember that as my first time. those thoughts are never going to leave my mind. and it sucks. so i wish u all the luck in the world. NEVER LET THIS HAPPEN TO YOU. it sucks really bad. i just want to break down and cry. but i can't. i need to be strong and show him he is an asshole a mother fucking ass hole and even though he killed back then..i have to pretend it did nothing and that i am strong. fuck what am i talking about i am weaker then ever. have a great vacation.


~*Casey*~

  kileys over and were having the best time! were too busy for you. lol. jk. other wize we wouldn't be updating right now. message from kiley to erin: u can't open the present until thursday afterschool!!!!! resist the temptation!  ok message over. lol. erin i love you 2. lol. hehe. its casey just so u know. i think were headed over to nates house and simons going to be there. too bad ur busy erin i wish u could come. hope ur hair cut turns out gr8888888!

bye bye for now

hey, i couldn't think of a better time i needed all you guys then right now. i was so stupid. and i am so mad at myself. well many of you know, many being (erin, kiley, simon, brandon, nate,carly and the guy himself) that me and ______ had a secret relationship going on. we were kind of going out in secret. not kind of. we were. and i don't know why we kept it a secret we just kind of did. and i guess its over now. because i was looking for him today after school and i knew where he would be. and i saw the whole thing. and i don't know if he knows i saw him yet. but _____.. i am so pissed off at you. so i walk around the corner quietly so i could surprize him, and this girl _______ *not going to say* has him backing up against a wall and at first he was like no ____ i don't want to make out with you. and then that made me happy but then she was like "whats the problem nate, do you not find me attractive, because i like you" and all this shit. and i kind of expected him to be like i have a girlfriend even though we were going out in secret. but i wasn't the one who wanted it to be in secret. he was. and then she flashes him. and she obviously has bigger tits then me. and this just made me so sad because then after that he just willing starts making out with her, and i didn't want to see the rest. so i left. 



so please as my friends be here to support me. :-(.


Always,
